executable.title: Label Map Overlap Module
executable.description: A Slicer Module to calculate the overlap between multiple labels in a label map with a variety of indices.
executable.acknowledgements: This command module was derived from Insight/Examples/Filtering/ (copyright) Insight Software Consortium. See http://wiki.na-mic.org/Wiki/index.php/Slicer3:Execution_Model_Documentation for more detailed descriptions.

parameters.label: Number of label maps
parameters.description: Select the number of label maps for comparison
